item.title: UC Berkeley enhances computer science education with Azure OpenAI Service
item.description: Discover how UC Berkeley uses Azure OpenAI Service to enhance computer science education and prepare students for their future careers. The post UC Berkeley enhances computer science education with Azure OpenAI Service appeared first on Microsoft Azure Blog.
